amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to insert the Republican Study Committee budget proposal.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 112-423 to make reforms to several federal programs, freeze spending at $931 billion until the federal budget is balanced, and balance the budget by 2017.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 285, 3 Present (Roll no. 149).

action.text: Amendment (A005) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Garrett.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garrett amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 136 - 285, 3 Present (Roll no. 149).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Garrett.
